Text: have you heard of the lady mechanika series ? I would love to read the series

Hi blackcanary, sorry to bother, as you offered could you reupload the "Cyclops and Phoenix #1-4 (1994)" because the torrent you pointed is dead :(

Thanks!

riverchase, I really like Lady Mechanika as well (for the story, the art, and the recipes in #0 and #1 ;).  There have only been four issues so far and it's been a year since issue #3 was released.
